name: The Listener Season 1
summary: 《读心人》是加拿大的一部电视剧。《读心人》的故事围绕着托比·罗根，一个25岁的救护人员展开，他有个天大的秘密——他是个通灵者。一直来，托比隐藏起他的能力，只与他的老朋友亦是导师——雷·梅尔塞尔医生--对其略作试探。在他跟自己活力充沛的救护搭档奥斯曼值班的过程中，“倾听者”镜头紧随着托比尽力帮助那些处于危急之中的人们，并在此之间，逐步揭露他过去的真相。他的工作岌岌可危的同时，托比的议私人生活也不尽如人意。在探长查理·马克和急诊医生（前女友）奥利维亚·福赛特的帮助下，托比意识到他的能力能够帮助他人。

eps.name: I'm an Adult Now
eps.desc: After rescuing a young woman (Kristen Hager) from a fiery car crash, Toby (Craig Olejnik) is troubled by visions of her missing son. Clearly traumatized and frightened by her son's abduction, Toby is unable to get her to share any information. And as his own fears for the child's well-being increase, he realizes he's going to have to act quickly to make sense of the mental dissonance that plagues him.

eps.name: Emotional Rescue
eps.desc: After saving a childhood friend from a burning building, Toby (Craig Olejnik) tracks town an arsonist that he believes might be responsible for a series of fires in the city.

eps.name: A Voice in the Dark
eps.desc: Toby (Craig Olejnik) encounters a street person who may hold the key to locating a missing girl.

eps.name: Some Kinda Love
eps.desc: After meeting a young woman at a nightclub who is later found dead, Toby (Craig Olejnik) is considered the prime suspect and must clear his name.

eps.name: Lisa Says
eps.desc: When Toby (Craig Olejnik) saves a teenage boy from a gang beating, he learns that a series of drug store robberies may be linked to the runaway's turbulent past.

eps.name: Foggy Notion
eps.desc: After a shooting in Chinatown, Toby (Craig Olejnik) helps a blind woman solve the murder of her brother, who may have been involved in illegal activity.

eps.name: Iris
eps.desc: Toby (Craig Olejnik) connects with a young faith healer whose miraculous gift has put her life in jeopardy.

eps.name: One Way or Another
eps.desc: Toby's (Craig Olejnik) intuition that there may be something more to Detective Charlie Marks (Lisa Marcos) pursuit of a serial rapist brings them closer.

eps.name: Inside the Man
eps.desc: Toby (Craig Olejnik) is enlisted by Detective Charlie Marks (Lisa Marcos) to use his telepathic abilities on a traumatized teenager who witnessed the murder of his parents.

eps.name: Missing
eps.desc: Toby (Craig Olejnik) investigates a missing person case hoping the $100,000 reward will save Oz's (Ennis Esmer) parents from losing their home

eps.name: Beginning to See the Light
eps.desc: When Toby's (Craig Olejnik) patient dies after a hit-and-run, he discovers the man was convicted of embezzling four million dollars and his death wasn't an accident.

eps.name: My Sister's Keeper
eps.desc: Toby's (Craig Olejnik) paramedic skills are questioned when, while trying to save the victim's life, he disturbs a crime scene.

eps.name: The Journey
eps.desc: Toby (Craig Olejnik) learns that "John Doe" (Gordon Pinsent) an unidentified patient suffering from Alzheimer's could be linked to his past and that his dead mother may be alive.
